entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
